regular.title: Angelus

verses.verse: The Angel of the Lord declared unto Mary.
verses.response: And she conceived by the Holy Spirit.

verses.verse: Behold the handmaid of the Lord.
verses.response: Be it done unto me according to Thy Word.

verses.verse: And the Word was made flesh.
Pray for us, O holy Mother of God.
verses.response: That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ.

regular.prayer: Let us pray. Pour forth, we beseech Thee, O Lord, Thy grace into our hearts; that we, to whom the Incarnation of Christ, Thy Son, was made known by the message of an Angel, may, by His Passion and Cross, be brought to the glory of His Resurrection. Through the same Christ our Lord. Amen.

easter.title: Regina Caeli

verses.response: For He whom you did merit to bear, alleluia.

verses.verse: Has risen, as He said, alleluia.
verses.response: Pray for us to God, alleluia.

verses.verse: Rejoice and be glad, O Virgin Mary, alleluia.
verses.response: For the Lord has truly risen, alleluia.

easter.prayer: Let us pray. O God, who by the Resurrection of Thy Son, our Lord Jesus Christ, didst vouchsafe to make glad the whole world, grant, we beseech Thee, that through the intercession of the Virgin Mary, His Mother, we may obtain the joys of eternal life. Through the same Christ our Lord. Amen.
